meanings.sent1: The excitement surged through the crowd as the team scored a goal.
meanings.sent2: The demand for the new product surged after the positive reviews.
meanings.sent3: The surge of laughter erupted when the clown slipped on a banana peel.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence surged like a wave crashing onto the shore.
meanings.sent5: The adrenaline surged through his veins as he prepared for the race.

meanings.definition: A sudden powerful forward or upward movement
meanings.sent1: The surge of water carried the boat downstream.
meanings.sent2: The surge of applause filled the auditorium after the performance.
meanings.sent3: The surge of students rushing to the cafeteria created chaos in the hallway.
meanings.sent4: The surge of emotions overwhelmed her during the heartfelt speech.
meanings.sent5: The surge of wind nearly knocked over the umbrella on the beach.
